title: didn't received my star guardian skin yet.
body: I did the quiz several times in different days and now its already been 3 weeks and still didn't got my skin.

replies.body: I don't believe there are skin rewards for Star Guardian.  The quiz is specifically for a Summoner Icon known as Mark of the Star Guardian.  It can take up to 72 hours for the icon to arrive or longer.  If you haven't received your icon in a week, send us a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  We'll be happy to take a look and see what's going on!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=JTAPzX37,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-10-26T17:01:42.060+0000)
>
> I don't believe there are skin rewards for Star Guardian.  The quiz is specifically for a Summoner Icon known as Mark of the Star Guardian.  It can take up to 72 hours for the icon to arrive or longer.  If you haven't received your icon in a week, send us a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  We'll be happy to take a look and see what's going on!

oh, sorry for the mistake. I meant the star guardian icon.
thank you.
